ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Vx680 3G", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Vx680 BT/Wi-fi", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Vx520", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Vx670", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "A920", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Vx690", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Vx810", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "IWL220", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "IWL250", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "i7780", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Pax A920 - Black (1GB)", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Not Required", TEXT(Base_Station__c) <> "Not Required", NOT( ISNULL (Base_Station_Unit__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This terminal type does not require a Base Station.
